refinements.reason: Standardize to a single-word prefix for consistency with other technical tags
Ensure consistency; #endpoint is already valid and widely used. No redundancy reduction needed.
Shorten while maintaining clarity; consolidates common error-related documentation
#performance is already a valid tag; #performance-tuning is redundant if #performance covers broader context.
#security is already a valid tag; #security-best-practices is redundant if #security covers broader scope.
Shorten while maintaining clarity; consolidates user-facing documentation.

#monitor is already a valid tag; no redundancy reduction needed.

new_tags.reason: Group all DevOps-related documentation (e.g., CI/CD, deployment, automation)
Group all cloud-related documentation (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP, serverless)
Group all compliance-related documentation (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA, security standards)
Explicitly mark CI/CD documentation (if not already covered under #devops)
